name: magical journey
description:
Magical Journey

Magical Journey is an action-adventure game with gorgeous graphics and rich gameplay levels that require you to control monkeys to eat gold without falling.

The game features


All kinds of beautiful skins can be unlocked: hats, helmets, clothes, pants, capes, shoes, straps, gloves, earrings...
Weapons: Four weapons can be unlocked: hammer, slingshot, sword and bow. Each weapon has several different levels, and unlocking more powerful weapons will make it easier to complete.
Skills: The protagonist has four skills, flying, Magnet, Gold X2, shield.. Skills can be unlocked and upgraded.

Game play

You'll need four upgradeable weapons -- hammers, slingshots, swords, bows, and four skills -- to navigate the level, with enemies in the way and traps to avoid.

The player controls an omnipotent little monkey, kills enemies, absorbs gold, avoids the mechanism, and completes the level adventure.
Game up to 50 + scenes.
Very pleasant music in the background.
5 Beautiful island environment that is constantly being updated.
Up to 7 different characters can be unlocked.
